about_the_game:
JOIN OUR DISCORD:

Run your dream museum in a small cozy town!


Go digging in exotic locations all over the world in search of ancient artifacts to study and display in your museum. Decorate your museum to your heart's content and fight off monsters while you go treasure-hunting! Manage staff, choose from a variety of exhibit types, and even theme your museums!

The local town is on the tail-end of decades of economic decline and it is your job to use your museum to help the local townsfolk and oversee the economic revival of your little locality.

Meet a lovable cast of characters, each with their own quirky interests.

Also beware of art thieves and professional burglars!

Features:


  • Hundreds of historically-inspired artifacts to find from all over the World!
  • Go Treasure Hunting in procedurally-generated mines!
  • Decorate your museum to your heart’s content!
  • Theme sections of your museum to house artifacts of a certain material, age, location, or even all three!
  • Fight monsters underground!
  • Upgrade your tools!
  • Help your local town return to prosperity!

Don't forget to join our discord! ->

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or later; Apple Silicon M1 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Museum Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Build your dream museum and go digging for lost treasures! Manage staff, theme your exhibits, buy and sell artifacts, and fight creatures that try to disrupt your research! Watch out for thieves, and loud teenagers, and of course, use your museum to turn around the fortunes of your local town!
